trans-unit.source: This extension sets the Collation of each table and column of the current database (Currently only Default Connection was supported). So be careful: It works for me without any problems, but please: Make a database backup before you work with this extension.
To work with an UTF-8-based TYPO3-installation I prefer to set following settings with the InstallTool:
Here you see a list of all tables with their included fields of the current database. Red marked tables/columns are not set to your choice and can be changed with the next click on DB->UTF8.
